str2: A particle of succession, then, moreover.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition. From epi and tithemi; to impose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To see through, see clearly. From dia and blepo; to look through, i.e. Recover full vision.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and kathistemi; to reconstitute.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From en and blepo; to look on, i.e. to observe fixedly, or to discern clearly.
All, the whole, altogether. Absolutely all or every one.
Clearly, distinctly, plainly. Adverb from a compound of a derivative of telos and auge; in a far-shining manner, i.e. Plainly.
